Package com.dua3.utility.text

Class Font

java.lang.Object
com.dua3.utility.text.Font
Direct Known Subclasses:
FxFontEmbedded
public class Font extends Object
Generic font class.

  • Constructor Details

    • Font

      protected Font(FontData fontData, Color color)
      Constructor to create a Font instance with given font data and color.
      Parameters:
      fontData - The font data specifying the font's typeface, size, and style.
      color - The color of the font. It defines the text color associated with the font.

  • Method Details

    • getFont

      public static Font getFont(FontData fontData, Color color)
      Retrieves a Font instance from the cache based on the specified font data and color.
      Parameters:
      fontData - The font data specifying the font's typeface, size, and style.
      color - The color of the font, defining the text color associated with it.
      Returns:
      A Font instance matching the provided font data and color from the cache.

    • similar

      public static boolean similar(Font a, Font b)
      Test if two fonts are similar. This method is provided to be used when inheriting fonts because equals also tests both instances to be of the exact same class.
      Parameters:
      a - the first font
      b - the second font
      Returns:
      true, if a and b have the same attributes

    • delta

      public static FontDef delta(@Nullable Font a, @Nullable Font b)
      Determine differences between two fonts.
      Parameters:
      a - the first font
      b - the second font
      Returns:
      a FontDef instance that defines the changed values

      Get text color.
      Returns:

      Get the type (monospaced or proportional) for this font.

    • withSize

      public Font withSize(float size)
      Return a font derived from this font by applying the given size.
      Parameters:
      size - the new font size
      Returns:
      a copy of this font with the requested size, or this font, if the size matches

    • scaled

      public Font scaled(float s)
      Scales the font by a given factor.
      Parameters:
      s - the scaling factor
      Returns:
      a new Font instance that is scaled by the given factor, or this font if the scaling factor is 1

    • withBold

      public Font withBold(boolean flag)
      Return a font derived from this font by applying the given value for the bold attribute.
      Parameters:
      flag - the value to use
      Returns:
      a copy of this font with the bold attribute set to the requested value, or this font if values match

    • withItalic

      public Font withItalic(boolean flag)
      Return a font derived from this font by applying the given value for the italic attribute.
      Parameters:
      flag - the value to use
      Returns:
      a copy of this font with the italic attribute set to the requested value, or this font if values match

    • withUnderline

      public Font withUnderline(boolean flag)
      Return a font derived from this font by applying the given value for the underline attribute.
      Parameters:
      flag - the value to use
      Returns:
      a copy of this font with the underline attribute set to the requested value, or this font if values match

    • withStrikeThrough

      public Font withStrikeThrough(boolean flag)
      Return a font derived from this font by applying the given value for the strike-through attribute.
      Parameters:
      flag - the value to use
      Returns:
      a copy of this font with the strike-through attribute set to the requested value, or this font if values match

    • withFamily

      public Font withFamily(String family)
      Return a font derived from this font by replacing the family with the given value.
      Parameters:
      family - the value to use
      Returns:
      a copy of this font with the family set to the requested value, or this font if values match

    • withColor

      public Font withColor(Color color)
      Return a font derived from this font by replacing the color with the given value.
      Parameters:
      color - the value to use
      Returns:
      a copy of this font with the color set to the requested value, or this font if values match

    • getFontData

      public final FontData getFontData()
      Retrieves the font data associated with this font instance.
      Returns:
      the FontData object containing information about the font's typeface, size, and style.
